pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Analysis for Macroeconomic Time Series (ECM-MARS, BSTS, Bayesian GLM-AR(1)) // Implements three complementary pipelines for causal analysis on macroeconomic time series: (1) Error- Correction Models with Multivariate Adaptive Regression Splines (ECM-MARS), (2) Bayesian Structural Time Series (BSTS), and (3) Bayesian GLM with AR(1) errors validated with Leave-Future-Out (LFO). Heavy backends (Stan) are optional and never used in examples or tests.
